text:
SlashData| Technology Lead|Remote or Athens Based

Want to work with Microsoft, Amazon, Google, FB to help them understand software trends, as part of a high-calibre, distributed team? Get to lead a tech team that designs data solutions based on React, Lambda, Redux? SlashData is hiring a Technology Lead, Athens-based or remote apply here: https://visionmobile.workable.com/j/D9E4E9ECA7 or feel free to contact me: sarah@slashdata.co
